subject: [cc-devel] cclicense chooser API
body:
He guys,

I heard it should be possible to include an author and an agent (as in 
the party to contact for commercial licensing) when using the license 
REST API. A quick look at [1] and [2] and [3] did not reveal anything 
related to this. Does the possibility to set an author and an agent 
actually exist? If so, how can I use it?

[1] http://wiki.creativecommons.org/Creative_Commons_Web_Services
[2] http://api.creativecommons.org/docs/readme_dev.html
[3] http://api.creativecommons.org/readme_15.html

grtz
BjornW
